Services

Endpoint Manager

This module holds the Endpoint Manager definition used for wrapping mlflow serve calls for stages.

class mlflow_adsp.services.endpoint_manager.EndpointManager(client: MlflowClient, params: EndpointManagerParameters)

Bases: object

The EndpointManager handles wrapping mlflow serve and monitoring changes to the designation model version.

client

MLflow client

Type:

MlflowClient

params

Endpoint manager parameters

Type:

EndpointManagerParameters

metadata

The calculated metadata about the model

Type:

TargetMetadata

version

The current (known) model version if reloadable.

Type:

Optional[str] = None

SUBPROCESSES: list[Popen] = []
static serve(params: EndpointManagerParameters) → None

Serves the designation marked model for REST API consumption. Reloads the model if changed.

Parameters:

params (EndpointManagerParameters) – Endpoint Manager Parameters DTO

update() → None

(Re)starts the mlflow serve process if the model version changed.

Worker

Worker Service Definition Invoked through an anaconda-project run command when the Anaconda Data Science Platform launches the job.
